ValidationRule.description: If H_Category 1 is 'Ops - Sales Support', Minutes Worked field is required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT(BEGINS("$Profile.Name","System Admin")),ISPICKVAL( HRS4SCategory1__c ,"Ops - Sales Support"),ISBLANK( Minutes_Worked__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If H_Category 1 is 'Ops - Sales Support', Minutes Worked field is required
